translations: v．取消选择：在计算机操作中，取消对某个项目或对象的选择。
· I made a mistake, so I'm deselecting the option.
我犯了个错误，所以我要取消选择这个选项。

sentences.sentence: Selecting the checkbox creates a lookup relationship; deselecting it creates a dynamic relationship.
sentences.translation: 选中复选框，则创建查询关系；取消选中该复选框，则创建动态关系。

sentences.sentence: In addition, we chose to not use the default location by deselecting the option use default location.
sentences.translation: 另外，清除use default location选项，不使用默认位置。

sentences.sentence: It also lets you do "what if" planning by deselecting and reselecting attendees to move the time of the meeting.
sentences.translation: 还允许制定“如果…将会怎样(What if)”计划，通过取消选中和重新选择参加人员来改变会议时间。
